record.title: START THE DRILL
record.narrative:
START THE DRILL -- (House of Representatives - July 08, 2008)

[Page: H6180]
(Mr. BROUN of Georgia asked and was given permission to address the House for 1 minute and to revise and extend his remarks.)

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, right now America is drilling for ice on Mars; yet we cannot drill for oil in America. It's insane.
Coach Mark Richt of Georgia Bulldog football fame has three words, a phrase he uses to energize his football team: Finish the drill.
I have three words as a Congressman from Georgia and Representative of this body to energize America: Start the drill. Now.
